title: Are We in the Beginning of a Bull Market? Coinbase Researchers Weigh In
description: On 17 November 2023, David Duong, Head of Institutional Research, and David Han, Institutional Research Analyst at Coinbase, released their latest weekly crypto market commentary, offering insights into the current state and future prospects of the cryptocurrency market. On 17 November 2023, David Duong and David Han from Coinbase provided their latest insights into the […]

title: Down From the Peaks: A Look at Bitcoin, Ethereum, and Others Two Years After the 2021 Surge
description: It’s been slightly more than two years since the 2021 cryptocurrency boom, a time when the crypto economy reached its zenith with a valuation of $2.90 trillion on November 10, 2021. Although it has been an extended and harsh crypto winter marked by numerous upheavals, a substantial number of crypto assets have seen considerable growth […]

title: Ethereum co-founder faces accusations of encouraging fraudulent activity
description: The crypto industry is abuzz with a new controversy involving Joseph Lubin, the co-founder of Ethereum. On-chain investigator Mr. Huber, has accused Lubin of promoting fraudulent behavior within the crypto space, a claim that has caught the attention of both enthusiasts and skeptics alike. The accusation: A question of ethics and integrity The crux of ... Read more

title: Rich Dad Poor Dad” Author Advises Bitcoin Investment Amidst Global Strife; Is This Coin Also Worth Your Investment?
description: Robert Kiyosaki encourages more Bitcoin, gold, and silver investing amid economic uncertainty Rebel Satoshi fascinates meme coin enthusiasts ‘Rich Dad Poor Dad’ author Robert Kiyosaki is a popular Bitcoin maxi.
